content: Add helper functions to recovery_engine.rs: extract_type_values, create_enum_type_info, transform_result_to_correction
Build and fix any compile errors and compile warnings after adding helper functions
Update attempt_pattern_based_correction function signature to accept original_value, error, and context parameters
Build and fix any compile errors and compile warnings after signature change
Implement main logic in attempt_pattern_based_correction: use transformer registry, analyze error patterns, apply transformers
Build and fix any compile errors and compile warnings after main logic implementation
Run clippy and fix any issues after main function implementation
Update execute_level_3_pattern_transformations function signature to accept original_error parameter
Build and fix any compile errors and compile warnings after function signature update
Update attempt_format_recovery function to extract BrpError and pass to Level 3
Build and fix any compile errors and compile warnings after error extraction update
Update all calls to execute_level_3_pattern_transformations to pass the error parameter
Build and fix any compile errors and compile warnings after call site updates
Remove #[allow(dead_code)] from TransformerRegistry methods in transformers.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and compile warnings after removing dead code annotations
Run clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
STOP work and return control for code review - task new subagent to review changes focusing on duplication, complexity, and plan validation
